BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: PIKES PEAK OR BUST RODEO FOUNDATION

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PRESERVING OUR WESTERN HERITAGE AND SENSE OF COMMUNITY FOR BOTH RESIDENTS AND VISITORS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: OUR MISSION IS TO PRESERVE OUR WESTERN HERITAGE AND SENSE OF COMMUNITY WHILE PROVIDING RECREATION, EDUCATION AND EXCITING OPPORTUNITIES TO RESIDENTS AND VISITORS ALIKE WHILE MAINTAINING OUR ROOTS IN THE PIKES PEAK REGION.
IRS990.Desc: OPERATION OF EQUESTRIAN AND EVENT CENTER TO PROMOTE AND PRESERVE WESTERN HERITAGE AND SERVE THE COMMUNITY. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO MAKES GRANTS TO MILITARY ORGANIZATIONS WITHIN THE PIKES PEAK REGION TO SUPPORT OPERATIONS.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: PIKES PEAK TOP III - CHRISTOPHER STIDHAM

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES GRANT FUNDS TO NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS OR MILITARY BASES AND ACADEMIES IN THE PIKES PEAK REGION. THE GRANT FUNDS ARE SPECIFIED FOR USES WHICH ARE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE ORGANIZATION'S EXEMPT PURPOSE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S FINANCE COMMITTEE HAS AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BILL TUTT AND THAYER TUTT HAVE A FAMILY RELATIONSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BYLAWS WERE UPDATED TO INCREASE THE MAXIMUM NUMBER OF BOARD MEMBERS FROM 14 TO 17.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTING FIRM. ONCE A DRAFT IS AVAILABLE, A COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO ALL TRUSTEES FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: KYLE PARK IS LISTED AS AN OFFICER DUE TO HIS OVERSIGHT OF OPERATIONS OF THE NORRIS PENROSE EVENT CENTER AND DOES NOT HAVE OTHER RESPONSIBILITIES AS AN OFFICER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION WILL THOUGHTFULLY CONSIDER REQUESTS FOR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND GOVERNING DOCUMENTS. THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE A WRITTEN CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY.
